subject: Got it working! 2 files uploaded from Tom's Tube
author: Tom
full_text:
FINALLY! I got audacity working and processed my 1/19/10 session with my "Tom's
Tube" ghostbox

I was quite impressed, if I say so myself. Cant vouch for their authenticity
though, as I could not hear the questions and the requests I asked. The voices
sound quite plain and do not seem to be a snatch of radio sound--as I can hear
the scans in the background.

One seems to say "Its Oh for naught" and someething else at the end of it. The
other file seems to say "get down" in a fast faint voice near the beginning,
followed by a louder "he was like 40"

Im gonna have to put an external mike on the other recorder channel so I can
hear what I am saying and get some context to better interpret the validity of
the message (radio or paranormal)

That 25 inch long , 2 inch pipe that I use for a resonator seems to be very
effective.
